CustomField.description: FLOW ONLY: This is used in flow questionnaires to help determine the relationship a person has with the location. It designates how we route and value the case. If it is a Homeowner, Renter, etc. determines how we manage the case. Can be applied to other objects, but used to help us to determine litigation strategies.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Relationship the client has with the location
CustomField.label: Relationship to Location
